page.title: 04EVENTS 2
page.content: The medieval fair is an annual event and usually afterwards there is a scene from medieval times. In 1984 and 1985 the scene was from the Battle of Tewkesbury.This took the form of a re-enactment to commemorate the Battle,which was in 1471.It was one of the Battles of the Roses.The fair takes place on the Vineyards and over the other side of the river the medieval scene is acted. Both for the fair and the battle,people dress up in authentic costumes.Many traditional crafts are displayed during the afternoon.
